name: Flying Car Driving Simulator: Extreme Muscle Car Flight Pilot
name_original: Flying Car Driving Simulator: Extreme Muscle Car Flight Pilot
description:
Tired of classic Car Simulators? Ever wanted to drive muscle cars? Maybe fly an Airplane? This game is perfect for you! Now you can fly your Car like an Airplane, feel like a professional aircraft Flight Pilot. You are free in a world that you can do what you want.
Fly around the World and become the best Flying Car Pilot!

* Stunning HD Graphics
* Realistic and dynamic car physics
* Advanced airplane flight physics
* Easy to Play
